general_advisory: General Advisory: Keep your crop field free from weed to minimize the incidence of diseases and pests. Apply balanced and appropriate fertilizers according to cropâ€™s growth stage.

advisory: Complete the sowing of pre-germinated treated seeds in puddled soil by broadcasting or drum seeder.
Harvest when 2/3rd to 3/4th of the pods have changed to brown color.
Apply Quizalfop-ethyl 5% EC or Imazethapyr 10 SL for weed management.
Spray Profenophos 50 EC for controlling leaf eating caterpillar.
Apply Neem oil-based pesticide Azadiractin for pest management.
Need based spray of Acetamiprid 20% SP or Imidacloprid 17.8% SL for controlling sucking pest complex.
Irrigate the crop at a regular interval.
Go for hoeing, weeding and apply urea + MOP at six-to-seven- week stage followed by irrigation.
Complete hoeing, weeding and apply urea at six-week stage followed by irrigation.
Install Blue Sticky Trap for thrips control and monitor pest population.
Increase the amount of concentrate in the feed gradually before two months prior to calving.
Prevent animals from chill wind and floor.
Prevent poultry birds from severe chill wind and cold floor.
